SectionBody.Text: The Department of Management Services, in making determinations under s. 255.502(14)(b), shall determine a facility to be a qualified facility if the facility meets either of the following standards:

Subsection.Text: The facility is in compliance with the firesafety standards established by the State Fire Marshal for state-owned buildings, is in compliance with flood management criteria if it is located in a flood-prone area, and is in good operating condition in relation to its intended use.

The facility’s economic benefit to the pool will be equal to or greater than the cost of restoring the facility to the condition described in subsection (1). For purposes of this subsection, achieving such economic benefit means that the rent to be paid by the occupants of the facility will be adequate to repay the restoration costs within 5 years.
